
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.math.BigInteger;

/*
 * To change this template, choose Tools | Templates
 * and open the template in the editor.
 */
/**
 *
 * @author geek_guY
 */
 class CDZ1301 {

    public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));

        
        String s[] = br.readLine().split(" ");
        int T = Integer.parseInt(s[0]);
        String inp=s[1];
        int arr[] = new int[26];
        for(int x=0;x<26;x++)
        {
            arr[(int)inp.charAt(x)-97]= x;
        }
        
        while(T-->0)
        {
           String inp1 = br.readLine();
           String inp2 = br.readLine();
             int arr1[] = new int[26];
             int arr2[] = new int[26];
            for(int x=0;x<inp1.length();x++)
            {
                arr1[(int)inp1.charAt(x)-97]++;
            }
            for(int x=0;x<inp2.length();x++)
            {
                arr2[(int)inp2.charAt(x)-97]++;
            }
            int c1=0,c2=0;
            for(int x=0;x<26;x++)
            {
                int temp = arr1[x]-arr2[x];
                if(temp>0)
                {
                    c1 += arr[x];
//                    System.out.println("c1+="+temp*arr[x]);
                }
                else if(temp<0)
                {
                    c2 += arr[x];
 //                   System.out.println("c2-="+temp*arr[x]);
                }
            }
     //       System.out.println(c1);
       //     System.out.println(c2);
            if(c1>c2)
            {
                System.out.println("ALICE");
            }
            else if(c2>c1)
            {
            System.out.println("BOB");
            }
            else
            {
            System.out.println("TIE");
            }

        }
    }
}
